        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_61a8f3baa66dbeb51437d25b127282e8193ad92d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Synovial joints</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synovial Verbindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Joints de Synovial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Junções de Synovial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giunti di Synovial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρθρικές ενώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Empalmes de Synovial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a synovial joint composed of the two bones connected by ligaments. The synovial fluid secreted by the synovial membrane lubricates the cartilage to further reduce friction between the bones.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">synovial fluid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cartilage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ligaments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">synovial joint</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">synovial membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine synovial Verbindung, die
aus den zwei Knochen besteht, die durch Ligamente angeschlossen 
werden. Die synovial Flüssigkeit, die durch die synovial 
Membrane abgesondert wird, schmiert den Knorpel, um Friktion zwischen 
den Knochen weiter zu verringern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un joint synovial 
composé de deux os reliés par des ligaments. Le fluide 
synovial sécrété par la membrane synovial lubrifie le cartilage 
pour réduire plus loin le frottement entre les os.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma junção synovial 
composta dos dois ossos conectados por ligaments. O líquido 
synovial secreted pela membrana synovial lubrifica o cartilage para 
reduzir mais mais a fricção entre os ossos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un giunto synovial 
composto di due ossa collegate dai legamenti. Il liquido 
synovial secernuto dalla membrana synovial lubrifica la cartilagine 
più ulteriormente per ridurre l'attrito fra le ossa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αρθρική ένωση που 
αποτελείται από τα δύο κόκκαλα που συνδέονται με τους 
συνδέσμους. Το αρθρικό ρευστό που εκκρίνεται από την 
αρθρική μεμβράνη λαδώνει το χόνδρο για να μειώσει περαιτέρω την 
τριβή μεταξύ των κόκκαλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un empalme synovial 
integrado por los dos huesos conectados por los ligamentos. El 
líquido synovial secretado por la membrana synovial lubrica el 
cartílago para reducir más lejos la fricción entre los huesos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">synovial Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Knorpel</string>
